title: Lead ain't Dead
content: And not all [bears](http://web.archive.org/web/20120730030835/http:/lasquetipress.blogspot.com/) are hibernating either.
author: Linda Cunningham

comments.content: three cheers for lead, the bear, and your new proposal!

That bear is sure a cutie, isn't he? ;-)

I should have put a scale on the type: they are 1 cm tall....
